channel.title: üè¢ UC San Diego on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ UC San Diego on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Accelerating Transformers with Spectrum-Preserving Token Merging
item.description: PITOME: a novel token merging method accelerates Transformers by 40-60% while preserving accuracy, prioritizing informative tokens via an energy score.

item.title: Adapting Diffusion Models for Improved Prompt Compliance and Controllable Image Synthesis
item.description: FG-DMs revolutionize image synthesis by jointly modeling image and condition distributions, achieving higher object recall and enabling flexible editing.

item.title: Average gradient outer product as a mechanism for deep neural collapse
item.description: Deep Neural Collapse (DNC) explained via Average Gradient Outer Product (AGOP).

item.title: Clustering with Non-adaptive Subset Queries
item.description: This paper introduces novel non-adaptive algorithms for clustering using subset queries, achieving near-linear query complexity and improving upon existing limitations of pairwise query methods.

item.title: Continuous Partitioning for Graph-Based Semi-Supervised Learning
item.description: CutSSL: a novel framework for graph-based semi-supervised learning, surpasses state-of-the-art accuracy by solving a continuous nonconvex quadratic program that provably yields integer solutions, exce…

item.title: Differentially Private Reinforcement Learning with Self-Play
item.description: This paper presents DP-Nash-VI, a novel algorithm ensuring trajectory-wise privacy in multi-agent reinforcement learning, achieving near-optimal regret bounds under both joint and local differential p…

item.title: Distribution Learning with Valid Outputs Beyond the Worst-Case
item.description: Generative models often produce invalid outputs; this work shows that ensuring validity is easier than expected when using log-loss and carefully selecting model classes and data distributions.

item.title: Efficient LLM Scheduling by Learning to Rank
item.description: Learning to rank request outputs improves LLM scheduling, resulting in 2.8x lower chatbot latency and 6.5x higher synthetic data generation throughput.

item.title: Inexact Augmented Lagrangian Methods for Conic Optimization: Quadratic Growth and Linear Convergence
item.description: This paper proves that inexact ALMs applied to SDPs achieve linear convergence for both primal and dual iterates, contingent solely on strict complementarity and a bounded solution set, thus resol…

item.title: Iteratively Refined Early Interaction Alignment for Subgraph Matching based Graph Retrieval
item.description: IsoNet++ iteratively refines subgraph matching via early interaction GNNs and node-pair partner interactions, significantly boosting graph retrieval accuracy.

item.title: Learning from Uncertain Data: From Possible Worlds to Possible Models
item.description: ZORRO: A new method for learning linear models from uncertain data, providing sound over-approximations of all possible models and prediction ranges.

item.title: On Differentially Private U Statistics
item.description: New algorithms achieve near-optimal differentially private U-statistic estimation, significantly improving accuracy over existing methods.

item.title: Online Consistency of the Nearest Neighbor Rule
item.description: The 1-nearest neighbor rule achieves online consistency under surprisingly broad conditions: measurable label functions and mild assumptions on instance generation in doubling metric spaces.

item.title: Online Feature Updates Improve Online (Generalized) Label Shift Adaptation
item.description: Online Label Shift adaptation with Online Feature Updates (OLS-OFU) significantly boosts online label shift adaptation by dynamically refining feature extractors using self-supervised learning, achiev…

item.title: Provable and Efficient Dataset Distillation for Kernel Ridge Regression
item.description: One data point per class suffices for efficient and provable dataset distillation in kernel ridge regression, significantly reducing computational costs.

item.title: Quantifying and Optimizing Global Faithfulness in Persona-driven Role-playing
item.description: New APC metric precisely quantifies & optimizes global faithfulness in persona-driven role-playing, offering a fine-grained, explainable evaluation and improving AI character consistency.

item.title: RA-PbRL: Provably Efficient Risk-Aware Preference-Based Reinforcement Learning
item.description: RA-PbRL introduces a provably efficient algorithm for risk-aware preference-based reinforcement learning, addressing the limitations of existing risk-neutral methods in applications demanding heighten…

item.title: Sharpness-diversity tradeoff: improving flat ensembles with SharpBalance
item.description: SharpBalance, a novel training approach, effectively improves deep ensemble performance by addressing the sharpness-diversity trade-off, leading to significant improvements in both in-distribution and…

item.title: SpatialRGPT: Grounded Spatial Reasoning in Vision-Language Models
item.description: SpatialRGPT enhances Vision-Language Models’ spatial reasoning by integrating 3D scene graphs and depth information, achieving significant performance gains on spatial reasoning tasks.

item.title: Symmetry-Informed Governing Equation Discovery
item.description: Leveraging symmetry in automated equation discovery improves accuracy and simplicity of learned governing equations, enhancing robustness against noise and achieving higher success rates across divers…

item.title: Towards Diverse Device Heterogeneous Federated Learning via Task Arithmetic Knowledge Integration
item.description: TAKFL, a novel federated learning framework, tackles device heterogeneity by independently distilling knowledge from diverse devices and integrating it adaptively, achieving state-of-the-art performan…

item.title: UniMTS: Unified Pre-training for Motion Time Series
item.description: UniMTS, a novel unified pre-training model, achieves state-of-the-art performance in motion time series classification by generalizing across diverse device factors and activities.

item.title: VLG-CBM: Training Concept Bottleneck Models with Vision-Language Guidance
item.description: VLG-CBM enhances concept bottleneck models with vision-language guidance for faithful interpretability and improved accuracy.
